legislation: Legal Aid (Asylum and Immigration Appeals) (Northern Ireland) Regulations 2007 Legal Service (Asylum and Immigration Appeals) (Amendment) Regulations 2007
description: Letter dated 27/04/2007 from Vera Baird MP to Henry Bellingham MP and Simon Hughes MP regarding the debate on the Legal Aid (Asylum and Immigration Appeals) (Northern Ireland) Regulations 2007 and the Legal Service (Asylum and Immigration Appeals) (Amendment) Regulations 2007.
